timeline.bodyText: I have changed the isUmbrella from true to false in order to have right value in documentation, but I have not been able to determine if it has effect on code.
timeline.author: mmadoo

timeline.bodyText: It is better to use the path to md and not the resulting path.
timeline.author: farodin91
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -48,13 +48,13 @@ modified in another, both transactions will successfully commit on
 eventually consistent storage backends and the vertex will still exist
 with only the modified properties or edges. This is referred to as a
 ghost vertex. It is possible to guard against ghost vertices on
-eventually consistent backends using key [uniqueness](#index-unique) but
+eventually consistent backends using key [uniqueness](index-performance/#index-uniqueness) but

timeline.message:
[doc only] #2044 [Documentation] Some properties like index.*.elasticsearch.create.ext.number_of_shards are not present in configuration reference

Signed-off-by: Nicolas Trangosi <nicolas.trangosi@dcbrain.com>
